attributes.action: Say NO to the Russia 2018 World Cup!.
attributes.additional_details:
In the light of the recent tragedy of flight mh17 we believe it is only right that our Prime Minister David Cameron helps push for FIFA to strip Russia of the 2018 World Cup.

The country is well known for its violence and racism in football and such a prestigious tournament as the World Cup should not be held in a country that has turned its head of all responsibility for MH17.

Why not push for The UK to host the event?. If that isn't possible we still would like for you to push FIFA to strip Russia of the 2018 World Cup as it is not safe for any fans let alone our own to go to such a country in the light of recent problems.

DAVID CAMERON PUSH FIFA TO STRIP RUSSIA OF THE 2018 WORLD CUP.

Thank you.
